sentences.en: An industrial tribunal has no jurisdiction to decide whether an employee was fairly or unfairly dismissed.
sentences.cn: 劳资仲裁法庭无权判定解雇是否正当。

sentences.en: Each tribunal consists of two judges.
sentences.cn: 每个裁判所由两名法官组成.

sentences.en: He told the tribunal his career had "taken a nosedive" since his dismissal last year.
sentences.cn: 他告诉仲裁委员会，自去年被解雇以来，他的职业生涯就陷入了低谷。

sentences.en: He took his case of unfair dismissal to the industrial relations tribunal.
sentences.cn: 他将其遭不公正解雇一事上诉劳工关系法庭.

sentences.en: He was brought before the tribunal for trial.
His case comes before an industrial tribunal in March.
sentences.cn: 他的讼案将于3月在劳资法庭受审。

sentences.en: Last February the tribunal agreed he had been the victim of racial discrimination.
sentences.cn: 去年2月，特别法庭裁定他为种族歧视的受害者。

sentences.en: She took her case to a tribunal.
sentences.cn: 她把案件提交特别法庭审理。

sentences.en: The arbitral tribunal shall be entitled to require security for the costs of such measures.
sentences.cn: 仲裁庭应有权要求对此种措施的费用缴付保证金.

sentences.en: The case of your redundancy will be heard by an independent tribunal.
sentences.cn: 你被裁员一案将由一个独立的审理委员会来审理。

sentences.en: The matter has been remitted to a higher tribunal.
sentences.cn: 那事件已送呈上一级法庭裁决.

sentences.en: The rent tribunal reduced my rent.
sentences.cn: 房租审理委员会减少了我的房租.

sentences.en: The tribunal had been set up to arbitrate in the dispute.
sentences.cn: 曾设立过特别法庭对此纷争作出仲裁。

sentences.en: The tribunal is unique because Mr Jones is not subject to the normal police discipline code.
sentences.cn: 因为琼斯先生不受一般的治安条例法规约束，所以专门设立了特别法庭。

sentences.en: The tribunal should act in good faith.
The tribunal's terms of reference do not cover traffice offences.
sentences.cn: 法庭的授权调查事项不包括交通肇事罪.
